articles.author: STEVE DOUGLAS
articles.title: Germany's game with Denmark resumes at Euro 2024 after thunderstorm - The Associated Press
articles.description: Germany went from despair to delight in the space of a minute as a couple of big VAR calls set the host nation on its way to a 2-0 win over Denmark and a place in the European Championship quarterfinals. Denmark defender Joachim Andersen had a goal disallowed…
articles.content: DORTMUND, Germany (AP) Germany went from despair to delight in the space of a minute as a couple of big VAR calls set the host nation on its way to a storm-affected 2-0 win over Denmark and a place i… [+585 chars]
